data.name: 雪凤山 Secret Opera
data.detailed_description:
In the countryside in the 1980s and 1990s, we can often see the performance scenes of drama troupes going to the countryside. Now, the performance form of opera has gradually declined. I wonder if you can still see a rural drama performance for a long time? Of course, players who want to understand the performance form of rural drama can also get the corresponding experience through the game content.

In the murders on the stage of the drama show, what did the villagers see that made them afraid? Everything seems to be related to the source of opera and a mysterious ceremony

Role introduction

Lu Zhi

City people with strange identities are somewhat out of tune in this drama troupe, but I don't seem to have this consciousness. For Lu Zhi, who goes his own way, it's enough as long as he can see mysterious and novel things.

often

What kind of state of mind is hidden under the dull and unchanged expression of the witch in Yuanxiang village? For Lu Zhi, a foreigner, it seems very difficult to get close to her

Qing Chen

The musicians of the opera troupe, with their rebellious appearance, are actually - huh? Why are you still so arrogant? Hey, it's not the same as the agreement.

Lu Xiaojie

The little girls in Yuanxiang village seem to yearn for urban life and are very curious about Lu Zhi from big cities. According to Lu Zhi, Lu Xiaojie is like a brown sugar and can't be thrown away.

light

The head of the drama troupe, no one knows his specific name, only that he is a complete freak - the confusing operations such as impromptu singing under the overpass with bare arms in winter and suddenly turning over in the street all add a lot to his freak image

data.short_description: In the Spring Festival of 2005, the blizzard in Xuefeng mountain trapped the drama troupe performing in the village. At the same time, there was a homicide during the performance. Unlike the nervous members of the drama troupe, the villagers were afraid of a more terrible existence than the homicide
